cause.description:
There are at least four recognized types of OI, representing extreme variations in severity and affecting more than 30,000 people in the United States. For a person with OI, a cough or a sneeze can break a rib, rolling over can break a leg. The Osteogenesis Imperfecta Foundation, founded in 1970 as a national network of volunteers hosting support groups for people with OI and their families, has a dual purpose of funding research to find a cure and providing support to people with OI and their families.
1. Find a cure for Osteogenesis Imperfecta
2. Treatment for Osteogenesis Imperfecta
3. Research for Osteogenesis Imperfecta
cause.mission: Osteogenesis imperfecta (OI) is a genetic disorder characterized by brittle bones that break very easily.
